description:
mDNS Browser

mDNS Browser
What's Changed
Exciting new feature :sparkler:
- feat(updater): install updates on demand only by @hrzlgnm in #343
Enhancements: :sparkles:
- chore(version): bump version to 0.8.12 by @github-actions in #342
Dependency Updates :arrow_up:
- chore(deps): lock file maintenance by @renovate in #344
- chore(build-deps): update build dependencies by @hrzlgnm in #348
Full Changelog: https://github.com/hrzlgnm/mdns-browser/compare/mdns-browser-v0.8.11...mdns-browser-v0.8.12Auditable binaries since v0.8.x
The binaries built for desktop targets are now all build in auditable mode using cargo-auditable.
For information on how to audit the binaries see UsageAttested build artifacts since v0.8.x
The build artifacts are now attested. Attestations information about he binaries is available here. For more information and details on how to verify those, see Verifying artifact attestations with the GitHub CLI
